title: Dragon Rider Descent: The Jade Warrior's Race
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), high detail, an epic full-shot illustration of a fearless mountain biker racing intensely down a dark, root-covered forest trail. The biker wears highly detailed, stylized green and gold armor reminiscent of a Chinese warrior (Wuxia), complete with a horned helmet and a long, flowing jade sash. The trail is shrouded in deep mossy growth and giant ancient trees forming a canopy tunnel. In the background, a brilliant sun flares behind a cascading waterfall where a majestic, serpentine Chinese dragon spirit emerges from the mist. Dynamic motion blur on the wheels and dust trails, vibrant colors, dramatic lighting, falling red petals. Donghua Chinese style, 16:9 aspect ratio, intense action scene.
